game.name: Line Up!
game.categories: 멀티플레이어, PvP, 스크린 공유 및 분할 PvP, 공유 및 분할 화면, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 음량 개별 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 스테레오 사운드, Steam Cloud, Remote Play TV, Remote Play Together, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Lead your babies, protect your flock, and claim the longest line! Do you have what it takes to be the ultimate Mama? Gather your flock and find out in Line Up!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Lead your babies, protect your flock, and claim the longest line! Do you have what it takes to be the ultimate Mama? Gather your flock and find out in Line Up!
